headline: FIS Announces ATLAS SP Partners as New Client for Commercial Loan Servicing Solution
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., June 03, 2025--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, today announced that ATLAS SP Partners (ATLAS), a leading provider of structured and asset-backed credit to institutional borrowers and institutional investors, has chosen FIS’ Commercial Loan Servicing solution to help power ATLAS’ loan lifecycle processing workflows. The solution’s automated capabilities, flexibility, and enhanced risk management offerings will support ATLAS’ continued best-in-class s
